                       java.lang.String artist,
                       int year,

        Parameters:
        title - music title
        artist - artist
        year - year
        list_of_tags - list of tags
        Returns:

      • get

        public Music get​(int id)
        Returns the music matching the id given as a parameter. Note that this method uses get() in which could return null. But, the use cases in this system always make sure there are no exceptions.
        Parameters:
        id - music id
        Returns:
        Music matching the id
